question: Test cross in Pea plant is
choices: A cross between <katex>$F_2$</katex> tall plant and recessive parent
A cross between <katex>$F_2$</katex> dwarf plant and recessive parent
A cross between <katex>$F_2$</katex> tall plant with dominant parent
explanation: A test cross is a cross between an organism with a dominant phenotype (whose genotype is to be determined, e.g., <katex>$F_2$</katex>) and the recessive parent[cite: 117, 119].
